script: Good sport. Have fun?,This thing on? Hey, Ms. Potts. Pep. If you find this recording, don’t post it on social media. It’s going to be a real tearjerker.,I don’t know if you’re ever going to see these. I don’t even know if you’re still...God, I hope so. Today’s day twenty-one, no...twenty- two.,You know, if it wasn’t for the existential terror of staring into the literal void of space, I’d say I’m feeling a little better today. Infection’s run its course, thanks to the Blue Meanie back there. You’d like her. She’s very practical. And only a tiny bit sadistic.,The fuel cells were cracked during battle, but we figured out a way to reverse the ion charge. Bought ourselves about 48 hours of flight time. Problem is that was about...49 hours ago.,Which means, we’re dead in the water. A thousand light years from the nearest 7-11.,Most of the quote-unquote ‘food’ and potable water ran out two weeks ago.,Pep, I know I said no more surprises. But, I gotta say, I was really hoping to pull off one last one. But it looks like...well, you know what it looks like.,Don’t feel bad about this. I mean, actually, if you grovel for a couple weeks, and then move on with enormous guilt...I should probably lie down for a minute, rest my eyes. Please know, when I drift off, it will be like every day lately. I’m fine, totally fine. I’m going to dream about you. It’s always you.,I couldn’t stop him.,I lost the kid.,Is Pepper...?,I’m not going anywhere.,Where is he now?,What’s his deal?,Until this second, I literally thought you were a Build-a-Bear.,Who told you that? I didn’t fight him, he wiped my face with a planet while a Bleecker Street magician gave away the store. There was no fight because he’s not beatable.,I saw this coming, few years back. Didn’t wanna believe. I thought I was dreaming...,And I needed you, as in past tense. That trumps what you need. It’s too late, buddy. You know what I need?,I need a shave and a burger, not a bowl of soup. And I believe I remember telling all of you, alive and otherwise, that we needed a suit of armor around the world, whether it impacted our precious freedoms or not-,I said we’d lose, you said we’d “do that together, too.” Guess what, Cap, we lost, and you weren’t there. But that’s what we do, right? Our best work after the fact? We’re the “Avengers”, not the “Pre-vengers-”,I’ve got nothing for ya, Cap. No coordinates, no clues, no strategies, no options. Zero, zip, nada. No trust. Here. You take this. You find him, you put this on, and hide. I’m fine!,Morgan H. Stark. Chow time. Want some lunch?,You should not be wearing that. It’s part of a special anniversary gift I made for Mom. You thinking about lunch?,Where’d you find this?,You like going in the garage? So does Daddy. It’s all right. Mommy never wears what I buy her.,I just want to thank you folks for dropping by. It’s not every day one gets to contemplate biting it on an inter-dimensional timescape.,So you’re calling it a plan. To me, it sounds like an exotic suicide method. Not to mention, it’s impossible.,Quantum fluctuation kinda messes with the Planck Scale, which then triggers the Deutsch Proposition, can we agree on that? Chai? In layman’s terms, it means you can cancel your Netflix subscription because you’re not coming home.,Which was a billion-to-one cosmic fluke. Now you want to pull a- What are you calling it?,Oh, of course, a time heist, why didn’t we think of this before? Right, because it’s a pipe dream. Who are you again?,Or screw it up worse than he already has.,Gotta say it. Sometimes I’ve missed that giddy optimism. Sadly, all your high hopes won’t help me if there’s no logical, tangible way for me to safely execute said “time heist.” I believe the most likely outcome would be our collective demise.,Stop, Scott. Stop. Are you telling me that your plan to save the universe is more than loosely based on Back to the Future?,Good. Because that would be horseshit. Scientifically speaking, your brother’s picture doesn’t disappear just ‘cause you went to the dance with your mom. That’s not how quantum physics works.,We did stand. And yet here we are.,Please don’t-,Fine.,No, Scott. I won’t. Even.,Good job. I’m saved. I wish you were coming here to ask me something else. I’m honestly happy to see you. If you want to stay-,Yeah, well, I got my second chance right here. I can’t roll the dice on it. The table is set for six. If you don’t talk shop, you’re welcome to stay for lunch.,Friday, you up?,I’ve had a mild inspiration, like to see if it checks out. I would like to run one last sim before we pack it in for the night. This time, in the shape of a Mobius Strip, inverted.,All right, give me the eigenvalue of that particle, factoring in spectral decomp. Run it. That’ll take a second. And don’t worry if it doesn’t pan out, I’m just kind of...,Shit.,What are you doing up?,First of all, that’s a Mommy word, she coined it.,I just had something on my mind.,Correct. Great minds think alike. What kind do you want?,You done? Now you are.,Once upon a time, Maguna went to bed. The end.,Love you tons.,Wow, that’s a lot.,Out like a light. Don’t know how much she loves you but she loves me three thousand.,What’re you reading?,I think I solved it.,Time travel.,Yeah.,To say the least.,I know-,I can’t help everybody.,Not if I stopped right here.,I could just lock the lab, put it in a trunk, sink it to the bottom of the lake, and go to bed.,Why the long face? Wild guess, he turned into a baby?,EPR Paradox. Instead of pushing Lang through time, you were pushing time through Lang. It’s dangerous. I probably should’ve cautioned you against it.,Thank god, I’m here. Regardless, I fixed it.,That is a fully-functioning, time- space GPS. I just want peace. Resentment is corrosive. I hate it.,We’ve got a shot at the Stones. I just need you to know my priorities. Bring back everyone we lost, hopefully. Keep what I found, definitely. And, let’s not die trying.,But wait, there’s more. Act now, and it comes with a bonus offer.,What’s to know? He made it for you. Plus, I gotta get it out of the garage before Morgan takes it sledding.,Just don’t flaunt it. I didn’t bring enough for the whole team. We are getting the whole team, right?,Out of the way, Lebowski.,Hey, Ratchet, you get lost in there?,And you’re only in there because you have tiny hands.,Thank you.,Tell me something good...,I think you mean nearly been killed by one of the six Infinity Stones.,Our history. If I was SHIELD and I wanted to hide my quasi-fascistic black site, where would I hide it?,Good luck with that mission, Captain.,Come on, you little hexahedron, where are you hiding?,You may not know it now, but someday you’re going to be a real pain-in-the-ass.,No. Haven’t seen a soul.,No, sir. Just visiting from MIT.,Howard...,Potts.,That’d be swell.,Sauerkraut and a bouquet...big night planned?,Congratulations.,How far along is she?,I have a little girl.,Would that be so bad?,Got any names, yet?,You might let that stew a while. You’ve got time.,Yeah. I guess.,Wildly.,I pieced it together as I went along. I thought about what my dad did...,I tried to hold onto the good stuff. We’re all kinds of stubborn.,There’s no way to send them back. Thanos destroyed our time machine.,Scott, how long do you need to get that thing working?,Doc. You said we win one in 14 million. Is this how it goes down?,You better be right.,Friday, what are they firing at?,And I...am Iron Man.,Everybody wants a happy ending. But it doesn’t always roll that way. Maybe this time.,I’m hoping if you play this back, it’s in celebration.,I hope families are reunited, I hope we get it back and something like a normal version of the planet has been restored. If there ever was such a thing.,God, what a world. Universe, now. If you’d told me ten years ago that we weren’t alone, let alone to this extent, I probably wouldn’t have been surprised. But come on...,Who knew what epic forces of dark and light would come into play? For better or worse, that’s the reality our children get to grow up in.,That’s why I thought I’d probably better record a little greeting, in the case of…an untimely death on my part.,I mean, death at any time is untimely, but...this “time travel” thing we’re going to try to pull off tomorrow has me scratching my head about the “survivability” of it all. But that’s the hero gig, right? Part of the journey is the end.,What am I even tripping for? Everything is going to work out exactly the way it’s supposed to.,I love you 3000.

It was fun.,Don’t bother.,I can tell you where Thanos is.,Thanos spent a long time trying to...perfect me. When he worked, he talked. About his Great Plan. Even disassembled, I wanted to please him. I’d ask, where would we go once his plan was complete? His answer was always the same,Planet is unnamed, but inhabitable. Man.,Was it Natasha?,Ask the Asgardians down there how much “my help” is worth.,They were gods! Now they’re fisherpeople! The ones that are left, anyway.,Stop. Stop. I know you think I’m down here, wallowing in my own self- pity, waiting to be rescued. But I’m fine. I’m happy. Whatever it is you’re offering, don’t care. Couldn’t care less.,What kind?,The Aether’s not a stone, it’s more of an angry sludge. My grandfather hid it from Dark Elves in a rock between dimensions that can only be accessed every 5000 years.,Or...by Jane. She stuck her hand in a rock. Then the Aether stuck itself inside her. And me in the middle. Just an idiot with an axe.,Yeah, I guess.,That’s a little harsh-,Okay, maybe just stop talking.,I’m not supposed to be like everyone else, though.,I’ve really missed you, Mum.,Mum, I have to tell you something-,But your future-,I wish we had more time-,No. Wait.,Still worthy.,Goodbye, Mum.,Why are you doing that?,Why are we talking as if she’s dead? We have the stones. Bring her back. C’mon, stop this shit.,What’s he talking about? Of course, we can.,No offense, but you’re...a very earthly being. And she’s a far better king than I could ever be.,It’s time to be who I am, rather than who I’m supposed to be. And a leader is who you are.,I’m counting on it, Your Majesty.,I’m not entirely sure. Of course...,Quail, that’s your own insecurities bubbling up.,There’ll be no knifing young Quail today. Everyone knows who’s in charge.

The universe required correction. After that, the stones served no purpose beyond temptation.,You should be grateful.,Gone. Reduced to atoms.,I used the stones to destroy the stones. It nearly killed me. But the work is done. It always will be.,Thank you, daughter. Perhaps I’ve treated you-,Ronan has located the Power Stone. I’m dispatching you to his ship.,His alternative is death. Ronan’s obsession clouds his judgement. After Loki, I’m taking no chances.,No. You won’t.,Sshhh...,Bring her to my ship.,Run diagnostics. Show me her memory file.,Impossible.,Where is this “other Nebula?”,Can you access her?,Search the duplicate’s memory for Infinity Stones.,Freeze image.,Avengers. Unruly wretches.,What’s this reflection. Amplify this, Maw.,No. The same Nebula. From two different times. Set course for Morag. And scan the duplicate’s memories. I want to see everything...,What’s wrong?,You should be grateful.,Gone. Reduced to atoms.,I used the stones to destroy the stones. The work is done. It always will be...,Nothing. Yet.,They’re not trying to stop something I’m going to do in our time. They’re trying to undo something I’ve already done in theirs.,I found them all. I won. Tipped the cosmic scales to balance.,My destiny.,Thank you, daughter. Perhaps I’ve treated you too-,And that is destiny fulfilled.,Ssh, child. I know. And you’ll have the chance to prove it...,Daughter?,So this is the future. Well done.,The arrogant never do.,Go. Find the stones. Bring them to me.,Wait.,You could not live with your own failure. And where did that bring you? Right back to me.,I thought by eliminating half of life, the other half would thrive. But you’ve shown me that’s impossible. Life clings to the past with bloody fingernails. As long as there are those who remember what was, there will be those unable to accept what can be. They will resist.,I’m thankful.
